article_text: John Boehner and Mitch McConnell: Looking ahead to the next Congress, we will honor the voters’ trust by focusing, first, on jobs and the economy. Among other things, that means a renewed effort to debate and vote on the many bills that passed the Republican-led House in recent years with bipartisan support, but were never even brought to a vote by the Democratic Senate majority.

article_metadata.news-keywords: John Boehner, Mitch McConnell, new Congress, Republican majority, Republican sweep, Republican priorities, bipartisanship
article_metadata.title: Boehner, Mitchell vow to get things done in new Congress | Miami Herald

article_summary:
John Boehner and Mitch McConnell: Looking ahead to the next Congress, we will honor the voters’ trust by focusing, first, on jobs and the economy.
Among other things, that means a renewed effort to debate and vote on the many bills that passed the Republican-led House in recent years with bipartisan support, but were never even brought to a vote by the Democratic Senate majority.
